dc_title_s: Map of the central portion of the Upper Peninsula, Michigan.
dc_description_s: With legend. Julius Bien, lithographer. Copy 2 has manuscript red coloring annotated to show iron ore deposits. "Pl.II." from the Atlas accompanying reports on Upper Peninsula of Michigan 1869-1873. 1 map; 85 x 69 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
